textBeforeTable: Affinities Melchizedek can be found during shuffle time in the Magatsu Mandala portion of the Magatsu Inaba dungeon or by fusion. How to Obtain "An angel of Gnosticism, said to be born from Sophia. In the Bible, he is mentioned as a righteous king." Info Melchizedek is a Persona of the Justice arcana. It specializes in the Light element. Its default level is 66. Edit Page    Last Edit: 2 years 4 months ago Melchizedek var baseUrl = "\/wikis\/shin-megami-tensei-persona-4-golden";
